title: Looking for Mid Laner..... Tournament and Flex. (Ongoing position if we like you)
body:
Looking for a Mid Laner (UPDATE)

- Currently have sup, top and jng, adc  filled. 
- Need to be boys.. I dont want any panzies. 
- Make sure you have fun and are active... We want to play tournaments often so that's the criteria lol 

Send me a msg: Dirty Tip Rat

Cant be a fuckwit and needs to have some substantial amount of social skills. (Use your mic you fuckers).
